Package org.microbean.construct.constant

package org.microbean.construct.constant
Provides classes and interfaces related to Java nominal descriptors.
Author:
Laird Nelson

    Package
    Description
    org.microbean.construct
    Provides classes and interfaces related to valid Java language constructs.
    org.microbean.construct.element
    Provides classes and interfaces related to valid Java language elements.

    Provides classes and interfaces related to valid Java language types.

    Provides classes and interfaces related to Java virtual machine constructs.
